Future Ready Index / ESSA Federal Report

div.p: Central Fulton School District is a small, rural district located in Fulton County. Total student population is approximately 1,035, which encompasses pre-kindergarten through 12th grade. Pre-K through grade five are located at the McConnellsburg Elementary School, grades six through eight in the McConnellsburg Middle School and grades nine through twelve at the McConnellsburg High School. All buildings are located on the same campus.
For the safety of our students and staff, all calls to or from the District arerecorded.

em.meta: An Equal Rights and Opportunities School District
